column1: // Latitude and longitude formated as map data
// Simulated data to illustrate Google Maps and Google Earth integration
// Location: Mohonk Preserve, New Paltz, NY
// This data is formated as D M S, D M, and D are also supported.
// D M S are separated by spaces ' ', degree, min ('), sec (") symbols are optional.
// N, S, E, W are optional, and used only for unsigned values.
